verses.text: KE U fakafeta‘i kia Sihova ‘i he taimi kotoa pē: Ko hono fakamālō ‘e ‘i hoku ngutu ma‘u pē.
‘E pōlepole hoku laumālie ‘ia Sihova: ‘E fanongo ki ai ‘a e kau tu‘utāmaki, pea te nau fiefia.
Mou kau mo au ke viki ‘a Sihova, Pea tau hākeaki‘i hono huafa fakataha.
Na‘a ku ha‘ao ki he ‘Eiki, pea ne talia; Pea ne hamusi au mei he‘eku ‘ū ilifia.
Na‘a nau hanga kiate ia, pea nau maama leva: Pea na‘e ‘ikai peko honau mata.
Si‘i tu‘utāmaki ko ē na‘e tautapa, pea na‘e ongo‘i ‘e Sihova, Pea ne fakahaofi mei hono faingata‘a kotoa.
‘Oku ‘apitanga ‘a e ‘āngelo ‘a Sihova takatakai ki he‘ene kau ‘apasia, Ke fai honau fakahaofia.
Mou kamata ki he ‘Eiki, ‘o ‘ilo ‘oku sai: Monū‘ia ā ka ko e to‘a ‘oku hūfanga ki ai.
Mou ‘apasia kia Sihova ‘a e kau lotu ‘a‘ana: He ‘oku ‘ikai ha masiva ‘a e kau ‘apasia kiate ia.
‘Oku ‘alefa pē ‘a e fanga laione talavou, mo nau fiekakai: Ka ko ha‘a kumi ki he ‘Eiki ‘e ‘ikai te nau masiva ha me‘a ‘e taha ‘oku lelei.
Ha‘u ā, fānau, ‘o fanongo mai: Ka u ako kiate kimoutolu ‘a e ‘apasia ki he ‘Eiki.
Ko hai tū ha tangata ‘oku fie mo‘ui? ‘Oku manako ‘aho lahi ke ne sio ki ha lelei?
Lama ho ‘elelo mei he kovi, Mo ho loungutu mei he lea loi.
Afe mei he kovi, ‘o fai lelei; Kumi ki he melino, ‘o tuli ki ai.
Ko e fofonga ‘o Sihova ‘oku lalama ki he kau mā‘oni‘oni, Pea ‘oku ne fakaongo ke ma‘u ‘enau tangi.
Ko e fōtunga ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘oku fe‘ao mo e kau faikovi, Ke tu‘usi ‘a e manatu ki ai ‘a māmani.
Na‘e tangi hake ‘a e fa‘ahinga ko ē, pea fanongo ‘e Sihova, ‘O ne hamusi mei honau faingata‘a kotoa.
He ko e loto lavea ‘oku ofi ki ai ‘a e ‘Eiki, Pea ‘oku ne fakamo‘ui ‘a kinautolu ‘oku laumālie mafesi.
Ko e angatonu ‘oku lahi ‘ene ngaahi mamahi: Ka ‘oku hamusi ia mei ai kotoa ‘e he ‘Eiki.
‘Oku ne tauhi hono ngaahi hui kotoa: ‘Oku ‘ikai fasi hanau taha.
‘E tāmate‘i ‘a e angahala ‘e he kovi: Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku fehi‘a ki he kau angatonu ‘e taute‘i.
‘Oku huhu‘i ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘a e mo‘ui ‘a e kau tamaio‘eiki ‘a‘ana: Pea ‘ilonga ha falala kiate ia ‘e ‘ikai fakahalaia.
